p: Among the secondary outcomes ( Table 4), the time of first postoperative flatus was shorter in TG ( P<0.001), so as the time of first postoperative defecation ( P<0.001). And the comfort of semi-fluid diet of TG was higher than that of CG ( P<0.001). For the frequency of symptoms, postoperative nausea was significantly less in TG ( P=0.029).
